2021-09-26T14:00:04Z: We'll see you in a couple of weeks' time for the Turkish Grand Prix - until then, see ya later!
2021-09-26T13:59:18Z: Here's the race report from the Russian GP: https://www.autosport.com/f1/news/russian-gp-race-report/6675241/
2021-09-26T13:40:19Z: Galling for Norris, I'm sure - he must feel as though the weather gods were against him today.
2021-09-26T13:36:43Z: Bottas claims fifth, ahead of Alonso, as Norris clears Raikkonen on the final lap to pick up seventh. Perez and Russell round out the top 10.
2021-09-26T13:36:15Z: Sainz finishes third, as Ricciardo salvages fourth for McLaren.
2021-09-26T13:35:40Z: Max Verstappen finishes second - 53.2s down on Hamilton.
2021-09-26T13:35:18Z: Lewis Hamilton takes his 100th Formula 1 victory at the Russian Grand Prix!
2021-09-26T13:34:11Z: Norris pitted and rejoins in eighth, but has slid out of the pitlane entry - so he'll likely cop a penalty for that.
2021-09-26T13:33:24Z: The incident between Stroll and Gasly will be investigated after the race.
2021-09-26T13:33:15Z: Formula 1: You get one of the most mixed-up races of the year, and Hamilton and Verstappen finish first and second.
2021-09-26T13:32:06Z: Leclerc, who stayed out on slicks, went straight on at Turn 5, causing a yellow flag.
2021-09-26T13:31:20Z: With all the chaos of the rain, Bottas is now back into the points in sixth.
2021-09-26T13:31:12Z: Norris is crawling to the pitlane now, this is a dream turned to a nightmare for him.
2021-09-26T13:30:36Z: Norris slides off! Hamilton takes the lead!
2021-09-26T13:28:34Z: Stroll had a crash at Turn 11 and there was contact with one of the AlphaTauri's too. This race has gone mad!
2021-09-26T13:26:05Z: Mercedes asked Hamilton to stop, but he's stayed out! He doesn't want the inters!
2021-09-26T13:25:46Z: Vettel and Stroll hit each other coming into Turn 11 and again exiting the corner!
2021-09-26T13:24:41Z: Bottas has come in for inters.
2021-09-26T13:24:06Z: Perez now clears Sainz for third!
2021-09-26T13:23:11Z: Norris goes wide! It's getting so slippery out there at Turn 5, but Norris somehow keeps ahead of Hamilton.
2021-09-26T13:22:32Z: Vettel is now into the points in 10th after passing Russell.
2021-09-26T13:20:38Z: Perez has cleared Ricciardo at Turn 13 with DRS, cementing fourth place at the next corner.
2021-09-26T13:18:53Z: Leclerc mugs Stroll on the outside of Turn 13 to take eighth.
2021-09-26T13:17:12Z: There's 10 laps to go, by the way.
2021-09-26T13:14:49Z: Leclerc finds a way through on Russell into Turn 4 to take ninth.
2021-09-26T13:13:27Z: Ricciardo continues to defend from Perez at the start of lap 41, as the Red Bull gets ever closer to the McLaren's gearbox.
2021-09-26T13:12:20Z: Leclerc is now ahead of Ocon for 10th. Just under two seconds to Russell in front.
2021-09-26T13:12:13Z: Perez is going after Ricciardo now, with the Australian vulnerable on DRS as he's dropped to 2s behind Sainz.
2021-09-26T13:11:58Z: Bottas, meanwhile, is still mired down in 14th and has dropped 1.6s away from Vettel ahead.
2021-09-26T13:11:19Z: Leclerc has cleared Raikkonen and is knocking on the door of points in 11th. Ocon is up ahead of him.
2021-09-26T13:10:27Z: Norris now drops a 1m37.423s, getting DRS off Mazepin, to try and open the gap.
2021-09-26T13:09:41Z: Another fastest lap for Hamilton, a 1m37.689s. Norris did a 1m38.118s in response.
2021-09-26T13:09:06Z: Alonso has dispatched Verstappen for sixth, and will now begin to close down Perez.
2021-09-26T13:08:10Z: Hamilton did a 1m37.770s, but Norris is now trying to respond.
2021-09-26T13:07:35Z: It was a slow right-rear for Perez, which sent him further down the order than expected - he'd looked good for third before that.
2021-09-26T13:06:41Z: After his stop, Alonso is now seventh from Stroll, Russell and Ocon to round out the top 10.
2021-09-26T13:06:43Z: Perez shuffles into fifth, behind Sainz and Ricciardo - and ahead of Verstappen. Team orders are due, surely.
2021-09-26T13:05:49Z: Perez and Alonso now pit, which now frees up Norris to retake the lead of the race.
2021-09-26T13:04:49Z: Bottas makes a mistake into Turn 2 and allows Leclerc back through just as he's come out of the pits. He drops back to 14th.
2021-09-26T13:04:20Z: The gap between Norris and Hamilton now stands at four seconds, as Leclerc finally pits.
2021-09-26T13:02:33Z: There's a 1m38.007s for Hamilton now. He's looking ominously quick at this stage.
2021-09-26T13:01:54Z: Bottas is about five seconds off 10th-placed Russell, who moves up into the points following Gasly's stop.
2021-09-26T13:01:43Z: Norris clears the yet-to-stop Leclerc for third, hoping to use the clean air to keep Hamilton at bay.
2021-09-26T13:00:37Z: Gasly pits from sixth place, releasing Sainz, Ricciardo et al.
2021-09-26T12:59:46Z: The AWS overtake-o-meter reckons Hamilton will be on Norris' gearbox in five laps' time.
2021-09-26T12:59:06Z: Russell is running 11th ahead of Ocon currently, with Raikkonen, Vettel, Bottas, Giovinazzi, Latifi, Tsunoda, Schumacher and Mazepin completing the field on lap 33.
2021-09-26T12:57:40Z: Verstappen now eases past Stroll with the DRS into Turn 2. That's ninth for the Red Bull driver, who is now 28s off the lead.
2021-09-26T12:57:41Z: Hamilton posts a 1m38.009s as he tries to close Norris down for the net lead.
2021-09-26T12:57:11Z: Perez, Alonso and Leclerc are the leading trio, but they're yet to stop.
2021-09-26T12:57:03Z: Ricciardo clears Stroll into Turn 13. Sainz is hounding Gasly ahead for sixth.
2021-09-26T12:55:57Z: Verstappen is right onto the back of Ricciardo for ninth.
2021-09-26T12:55:38Z: Hamilton also clears Gasly with little effort into Turn 13, claiming fifth.
2021-09-26T12:54:02Z: Bottas has made his stop and is now 16th on the mediums. Just the Finn and Verstappen on mediums currently, the rest on hards.
2021-09-26T12:53:06Z: Hamilton has cleared Stroll for seventh and is now on the hunt for Sainz, who has Gasly ahead.
2021-09-26T12:52:37Z: Verstappen sets a new fastest lap of 1m38.396s. He's 10th at the start of lap 29.
2021-09-26T12:52:25Z: Norris now pits from the lead! Hard tyres for the McLaren driver, and a lovely clean stop.
2021-09-26T12:51:10Z: Hamilton sits ninth ahead of Ricciardo and behind Stroll.
2021-09-26T12:50:53Z: Verstappen moves through on Russell into Turn 2 to take 11th.
2021-09-26T12:49:39Z: Vettel has pitted, while Sainz has found a way past Bottas for what is now P6.
2021-09-26T12:49:15Z: Hamilton pits from second - and Verstappen follows him in! Hard tyres for Hamilton, mediums for Verstappen.
2021-09-26T12:47:01Z: It looks like McLaren is trying to get Norris into the gap between Leclerc and Vettel now - the Brit has fallen into the 1m41s for the first time in a while, so it might be time soon.
2021-09-26T12:46:24Z: Ricciardo now sets the fastest lap with 1m39.124s down in 13th.
2021-09-26T12:45:20Z: It's a 1m39.908s for Hamilton, a new fastest lap.
2021-09-26T12:43:37Z: Sainz is now back into the top 10 following Ricciardo's slow stop. The Ferrari is closing in on Bottas ahead, who in turn still hasn't been able to clear Gasly.
2021-09-26T12:42:40Z: Ricciardo decides to stave off the risk of an undercut from Mercedes, coming in for his hard tyre stop, but it's a bit slow!
2021-09-26T12:41:16Z: Hamilton, while trying to clear Ricciardo for P2, is also under pressure from Perez behind him.
2021-09-26T12:39:39Z: Further back, Schumacher has pitted from 17th and rejoins last behind Mazepin, Tsunoda and Latifi.
2021-09-26T12:36:32Z: The clouds are really hovering over the circuit now - it looks quite dull and muggy out there.
2021-09-26T12:33:55Z: Mazepin down in last has been given a black and white flag, though it's unclear what for.
2021-09-26T12:33:47Z: Meanwhile, Ricciardo - now second - is holding off Hamilton behind him. Verstappen in sixth is homing in on this pack.
2021-09-26T12:33:22Z: Sainz in 11th has got about two seconds of daylight between himself and Stroll, with Russell a further 1.8s adrift.
2021-09-26T12:32:37Z: Norris looks to be trying for a one-stop here, not looking like he's going to make a pitstop.
2021-09-26T12:30:47Z: Bottas is now 10th behind Gasly and Vettel, with Sainz, Stroll and Russell occupying 11th to 13th after their stops.
2021-09-26T12:30:00Z: Leclerc is still hounding Verstappen for eighth as Ocon and Raikkonen ahead come in for their stop.
2021-09-26T12:29:23Z: It's not a stellar stop for Sainz, and Stroll is very much in his wheeltracks at this point!
2021-09-26T12:29:15Z: But Stroll in 14th now takes the fastest lap with 1m40.793s.
2021-09-26T12:28:43Z: After his stop, Russell has dropped from third to 15th as Leclerc sets the fastest lap with a 1m40.993s on his hard tyres.
2021-09-26T12:28:24Z: Sainz now comes in, having been passed by Norris, in a bid to cover off Stroll and Russell.
2021-09-26T12:28:01Z: Once again it was a Turn 13 move for Verstappen, picking off a medium-shod Vettel.
2021-09-26T12:27:41Z: Russell, meanwhile, pits from third - and gets undercut by Stroll!
2021-09-26T12:27:19Z: Verstappen has found a way through on Vettel for ninth. He's now only around eight seconds behind Hamilton after the first 14 laps.
2021-09-26T12:26:52Z: Norris takes the lead! The McLaren driver dives past at the back straight with DRS and claims first place!
2021-09-26T12:25:35Z: Verstappen is coming under fire from Leclerc over 11th spot, with Vettel now up to 10th following team-mate Stroll's stop.
2021-09-26T12:25:29Z: Stroll comes in to stop, taking on hard tyres.
2021-09-26T12:23:57Z: Norris has backed off a bit on this lap, perhaps just to charge up and regroup for another assault on his ex-team-mate. Sainz continues to hold firm.
2021-09-26T12:22:42Z: Norris once again has a pop at Sainz, but the Ferrari driver is covering him off expertly - holding the line through Turns 2-3 and keeping him away at Turn 4.
2021-09-26T12:22:27Z: Bottas, meanwhile, is yet to find a way through on Gasly.
2021-09-26T12:20:59Z: Leclerc and Vettel are going side-by-side for 11th place and Verstappen almost came into contact with the Ferrari through Turn 6. Vettel holds 11th, while Verstappen is up to 12th.
2021-09-26T12:20:45Z: Norris shadows Sainz into Turn 2, but can't find his way through just yet.
2021-09-26T12:18:48Z: Verstappen once again used DRS to fire it up the inside of Gasly at Turn 13.
2021-09-26T12:18:43Z: Norris is closing up to Sainz now, and is homing back into DRS range.
2021-09-26T12:18:14Z: Just as we say that, Verstappen has moved ahead into 13th. Bottas needs to do the same ASAP if he is to cause the Red Bull any grief this afternoon.
2021-09-26T12:17:38Z: Bottas hasn't let Verstappen disappear. He's keeping in touch with the DRS, while the Red Bull is yet to find a way through the AlphaTauri of Gasly on the eighth lap of this race.
2021-09-26T12:16:37Z: A better lap for Norris in comparison to Sainz that time around - the gap was floating around 2s, but the McLaren's cut that down a bit. Sainz is trying to stint-extend at the moment.
2021-09-26T12:15:42Z: Verstappen made great use of the DRS and a tow from Bottas to expertly carve up his inside into Turn 13.
2021-09-26T12:14:32Z: Verstappen goes up the inside of Bottas at the end of the back straight to take 14th. That is not what Mercedes needed from their driver!
2021-09-26T12:13:59Z: That group has broken away from Latifi in 17th, who is heading Giovinazzi, Tsunoda and Schumacher at the back of the pack.
2021-09-26T12:13:21Z: The scrap to crack into the top 10 is looking tasty. Raikkonen is holding away just over Vettel, with Leclerc, Gasly, Bottas and Verstappen close behind.
2021-09-26T12:13:00Z: Sainz posts a 1m41.396s to take the new fastest lap so far.
2021-09-26T12:12:09Z: The gap between Bottas and Verstappen stands at around eight tenths on lap five.
2021-09-26T12:11:40Z: Fastest lap has gone to Bottas in P14 with a 1m41.437s.
2021-09-26T12:11:32Z: Sainz is forging a lead now, and sits 1.6s ahead of Norris at the start of lap 5.
2021-09-26T12:10:38Z: Verstappen has followed Bottas through on Mazepin. Now the Mercedes driver has to play tail gunner for his team-mate.
2021-09-26T12:09:52Z: Verstappen has found a way through on Latifi for 16th as we head onto lap four. Bottas now ahead of Mazepin for 14th.
2021-09-26T12:09:12Z: Really nice move from Sainz at the start - the replay shows him getting a slower start than Russell, but the Spanish driver picks up the slipstream for Norris in front and claims the lead.
2021-09-26T12:07:46Z: Leclerc is harrying Vettel for 11th as they come to the end of lap two.
2021-09-26T12:07:27Z: Hamilton gets a run on Alonso and now dives past at Turn 2, claiming back sixth place.
2021-09-26T12:06:55Z: Sainz begins lap 2 with a one-second lead over Norris, with Russell a further two seconds back!
2021-09-26T12:06:25Z: Ricciardo alongside Alonso down the back sweeping straightaway, and dives past for fifth place!
2021-09-26T12:06:02Z: At the back Verstappen is up to 17th ahead of Schumacher, Giovinazzi and Tsunoda. Leclerc is 12th and Bottas 15th.
2021-09-26T12:05:44Z: Hamilton's had a really iffy start and loses places to Stroll, Alonso and Ricciardo!
2021-09-26T12:05:37Z: Hamilton only seventh after the opening salvo of corners.
2021-09-26T12:05:08Z: Norris gets away nicely, but Sainz gets an excellent slipstream into Turn 2 and claims the lead!
2021-09-26T12:04:14Z: The 2021 Russian Grand Prix is go!
2021-09-26T12:03:18Z: The cars now line up, ready for the start...
2021-09-26T12:00:18Z: The formation lap is now underway.
2021-09-26T11:59:02Z: We've got the majority of the field on the mediums, with Alonso, Perez, Gasly, Bottas, Giovinazzi, Leclerc and Verstappen on hards.
2021-09-26T11:56:25Z: Just under five minutes until what could be a very spicy Sochi encounter today...
2021-09-26T11:56:01Z: Adding Shostakovich to that list of composers, there are many more I've missed. Trying to offset this chat with a classical music pun - but I'm really going for baroque...
2021-09-26T11:52:09Z: Back to present-day movements, we have a 70% risk of rain today. Quelle surprise.
2021-09-26T11:51:18Z: Russia always knew how to churn out composers: Prokofiev, Tchaikovsky, Rimsky-Korsakov are such illustrious musicians.
2021-09-26T11:49:06Z: Since the Russian national anthem can't be played, we get what I believe is Prokofiev's Piano Concerto No. 1.
2021-09-26T11:42:51Z: Here's an archive piece from 2001 on then-emerging talent Kimi Raikkonen: https://www.autosport.com/f1/news/archive-how-unflappable-rookie-raikkonen-took-f1-by-storm/6674412/

2021-09-26T11:41:32Z: First of all, a few updates news-wise. Bottas has taken an engine penalty and will start 16th, while Antonio Giovinazzi has a new gearbox.
2021-09-26T11:37:48Z: We've got a tantalising front row of Lando Norris and Carlos Sainz Jr, with George Russell and Lewis Hamilton on Row 2. The excitement is palpable.
2021-09-26T11:36:53Z: Good afternoon everyone and welcome to our Autosport Live feed, as we approach the start of the Russian Grand Prix.
